Every story has an end, but in life, every ending is just a new beginning.-Matrix
Great men are not born great, they grow great.-The Godfather
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.-The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.-Winnie the Pooh
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.-The Wolf of Wall Street
If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.-Ratatouille
It’s supposed to be hard. If it wasn’t hard, everyone would do it. The hard is what makes it great.-A League of Their Own
Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.-Pocahontas
Fall seven times, stand up eight.-Mulan
When life gets you down, you know what you gotta do? Just keep swimming.-Finding Nemo
Only if you accept who you are, the world will too.-Kung Fu Panda
You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.-The Pirates of the Caribbean
Life isn’t about how many times you fall, it’s about how many times you get back up.-Karate Kid
